title: A Story About An Office Lady Getting Attached To A Delinquent High School Boy She Met At An Arcade
alternative_title: OLがゲーセンで会ったヤンキー男子高校生に懐かれる話 ; OL ga Gesen de Atta Yankee Danshi Koukousei ni Natsukareru Hanashi
status: OLがゲーセンで会ったヤンキー男子高校生に懐かれる話 ; OL ga Gesen de Atta Yankee Danshi Koukousei ni Natsukareru Hanashi
description:
Description :
        Office lady Haru frequents the arcade daily to distract from her discontent with her company. There she easily crushes a delinquent high school boy in a game and somehow, he becomes attached to her. From acquaintances who just met at the arcade to gaming buddy, and beyond that, their relationship is...!?
A heart-pounding and heart-warming exchange between an office lady and a delinquent high school boy begins!

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 7: Even His Delinquent Friends Started To Grow Attached To Her
Vol.1 Chapter 6: Making A Delinquent High School Boy Wait
Vol.1 Chapter 5: Dont Ask How Or Why The Tail Appears, For It Signals The End Of Days
